structuredContent.name: BENJAMIN STEIN
structuredContent.summary: Experienced Clinical Informatics Specialist with a strong background in healthcare IT systems, including EHR implementation and support, health information integration, and clinical staff training.

skills.text: Implementation, maintenance, and training of web-based EHR system
Administrative roles within Panorama 9, Verkada, SiPass, Zendesk, IT Glue, Chartnote
Troubleshooting EMR, Network, Interfaces, PC’s, Hardware, and Web Applications
Creating, modifying, or running reports via TruBridge Report Builder
Design and interpret reports in SAP Business Objects and Discern Analytics
Track tickets issues using Service Now
Manage user sessions with Citrix Desktop Director
Applications support for Epic, Meditech, and Mindray
Monitoring and maintaining health information integration engines
Remote support via Simple-Help remote desktop
Tasks within Active Directory, Exchange and SQL

experience.title: Clinical Informatics Specialist
experience.description: Responsible for all systems and technologies used at the hospital. Tasks include EHR system implementation, user onboarding, security configuration, vendor communication, and troubleshooting.

experience.title: Clinical Analyst II
experience.description: Provided 24x7 IT support for clinical staff, managed health information integration engines, and supported applications such as Epic and Meditech.

experience.title: Clinical Analyst I
experience.description: Supported tele-ICU services, managed virtual A/V servers, and provided remote support to clinical staff.
